topics.body:
Oh for fuck's sakes:

You know how the world's economy has been sluggishly recovering?  Well now the rich are getting pissy that it's not recovering through a artificial boom bubble.  If you're wondering what I mean by this is that we're all familiar with the idea of boom-bust cycles; well while this recovery has been sluggish the recovery is sustainable and chances are won't bust.  The reason why it's pissing off the rich is that this is bad for the super rich in that low risk equals low returns.  A stable economy is not a profitable economy for the wealthy.



To use a analogy imagine a kid trying to pop a water balloon that just won't pop no matter how hard he tries to jump on it and the kid getting pissy that it won't pop.

*Waits for the sand worm to resurface*
